body: Good but the dude was a dumb asshole
wtf, your sister is cuter than the girl you have crush on.
Hey, did I forget to comment yesterday or was it deleted?  I saw the other part too. Hmrph.
I meant artist, not author lol.

@mriczer
Well in anime when someone is called ugly they are meant to be in universe, sort of like in those scenes where some guy or girl is called "exceptionally beatiful or handsome" in an anime with sparkles around them while everyone in the scene looks at them as if they've seen a ghost walking when in fact everyone in the scene looks the fucking same and has the same basic facial structure, only the hair looks different.
It's a trope called generic cuteness/handsomeness. The way anime style and comic book art in general draw young males and females make it almost impossible for anyone to be called ugly and everyone has model tier looks, unless they try to make them look fatter or exceptionally ugly. Drawing doesn't have many of the nuances of real life and everything is in perfect symmetry and shape. 
Though the author could have done more effort, if anything because the author have put more effort to detail the nose of the girl in the pic, the 'ugly' sister actually looks cuter.
“Ugly face”? Is he living in a world that’s pure supermodels or something so that an average girl is “ugly”?
Don't forget to read the other part
